ul.li: Oregon YouthLine: https://oregonyouthline.org/ , call 1-877-968-8491 or text teen2teen to 839863 to talk with a peer or adult for support
Columbia County Mental Health Main Line: 503-397-5211 (They are still providing counseling services. Intakes and assessments are done via video conference)
211: dial 211 from any phone or text zip code to 898211 for free guidance or information on health and social services
